document.description: Examples of the lemma suggest from the MASC project for FN annotation
document.name: suggest

sentence.text: One writer , signing his letter as `` Red-blooded , balanced male , '' remarked on the `` frequency of women fainting in peals , '' and suggested that they `` settle back into their traditional role of making tea at meetings .
In Thomas Hardy 's The Hand of Ethelberta , it is suggested by Ethelberta that she and some others go to see Milton 's tomb in Cripplegate church .

It has been suggested that weight standards be adjusted upwards for age [ 8 ] . Such recommendations remain controversial , however , because the number of studies of older persons is fairly small , and because few studies have examined the relation of BMI to quality of life or years of healthy life ( YHL ) in the elderly [ 9 ] .

What do you suggest I do ?

May I suggest that your readers lobby their MPs on this subject ?
